subject: AI & Agents
title: Unsupervised Learning: Finding Hidden Structure
description: Learn Unsupervised Learning: Finding Hidden Structure in one minute.

hook.text: Dump a million customer records on a table. No labels. Can you find groups? AI can.

buildup.text: Unsupervised learning discovers structure in data without being told what to look for.

discovery.text: It clusters similar items together â€” customers who buy alike, genes that behave alike.

twist.text: The model finds patterns humans never noticed, but sometimes the patterns are meaningless.

climax.text: Spotify's 'Discover Weekly' groups songs you haven't heard with ones you love.

punchline.text: No labels needed â€” just let the data speak.

quiz.question: How does unsupervised learning differ from supervised learning?
